metadata.title: "Love Saves Lives" Mini Pins - Snowflake Edition. (1" Pins, 30 piece set)
features: 1" MINI-PINS (25.4mm): Each round pin measures approximately 1" tall x 1" wide.
30 PIECE SET: Each set includes 30 pins, each with a unique message of encouragement and support.

BEAUTIFULLY PACKAGED: Each set comes in a durable and reusable circular tin. With a nice viewing window on top, these pins are ready to gift as is. Or, they may be opened and kept to use as daily affirmations for yourself or anyone else who could use a smile.
MADE IN USA: Designed and manufactured by a growing and proud small business in the United States of America.
description: Each mini-pin is 1" in diameter. You will receive 30 pins total, which come in an attractive and reusable tin case.  Each pin has a unique statement intended to bring a smile to whoever sees it. These include:
The world is better because YOU are here.
The world is better because YOU are here.
You are one of a kind.
You are one of a kind.
YOU ARE WORTHY OF LOVE & JOY.
YOU ARE WORTHY OF LOVE & JOY.
These can be used in many ways, for instance:
Hand them out to strangers as Random Acts of Kindness.
Hand them out to strangers as Random Acts of Kindness.
Give them as a gift to a loved one.
Give them as a gift to a loved one.
Use them as holiday stocking stuffers.
Use them as holiday stocking stuffers.
Adorn your clothing, hat, or backpack.
Adorn your clothing, hat, or backpack.
Distribute them in waiting rooms, to cashiers, or to delivery people.
Distribute them in waiting rooms, to cashiers, or to delivery people.
Leave them on people's desks, include them with birthday cards, or gift to a teacher.
Leave them on people's desks, include them with birthday cards, or gift to a teacher.

These buttons are part of a campaign to share love and kindness. A handwritten note, a compliment, or a simple smile can save a life. Always remember, everyone is amazing in their own right, and everyone matters. You matter, and they matter too. So please, spread the love and let it be known.
metadata.details: {"Is Discontinued By Manufacturer": "No", "Package Dimensions": "3.1 x 3.1 x 1.2 inches; 2.08 Ounces", "Manufacturer recommended age": "3 years and up", "Item model number": "N001", "Date First Available": "September 2, 2016", "Manufacturer": "ILMS"}
